creator: mqmq87@web.de
text:
If I enter an URI which contains a fragment identifier in the SVG viewer, the
URI shows up with doubled fragment identifier and short after quadrupled
fragment identifier. |document.URI| has a doubled fragment identifier. The
document fails to load.

I use fragment identifiers to pass parameters to SVGs (XPointer-compatible:
"<RealURI>#x:param(key1=val1;key2=val2)").

creator: mqmq87@web.de
text:
The testcase works as expected when loaded with its simple URI:
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/attachment.cgi?id=17362

It fails when loaded with additional fragment identifier:
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/attachment.cgi?id=17362#x
This is now fixed in SVN
creator: deweese@apache.org
cam@apache.org
text: *** Bug 41585 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
